attributes.action: accept the 100 months calculation as his main concern in all future decisions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
100-months to save the world. That is what Price Charles described in the 33rd Richard Dimbleby lecture. 
Sign up here to make it real. 
The time has come. 
The time is NOW.

For information, search for the transcript and search for the 'one hundred months' campaign.
